content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in ragusa on february 10 2011 the case involved two parties referred to as party cf and party ts party cf sued party ts for coownership of a property cf claimed to be a coowner based on a purchase made in 2004 after reviewing the evidence and technical investigations the court found in favor of cf the court ordered ts to pay a balance of money to cf and also determined that the property should be divided and awarded to cf the court noted that the mortgage on the property had been paid off additionally the court ordered ts to pay a sum of euro 16667 to cf along with legal interest from the date of the judgment ts did not respond to the summons so the court decided in favor of cf the court also ordered ts to pay the costs of the proceedings which amounted to euro 253266 including costs and fees the decision was made on february 1 2011 and filed with the court on february 10 2011
